__e: I'm starting to feel like Ronald fucking Reagan.
The respectable Cuban-American girl whose parents worship Ronald Reagan, who enforce an 8 o'clock curfew on their daughter, in summer time, no less, there she is in high school, aged 15... 16.
I would not lay all of the blame at Ronald Reagan's feet, by any means.
Why did the letter of Carlotta Adams state quite clearly that it was Ronald Marsh who paid to her the sum of $2,000 when it was impossible he could have afforded that sum?
You had a telephone call earlier from Ronald Marsh, Mr Poirot.
